name: Very Basic Google Fonts
author: Banana Bread

sections.description: The simple, bare-bones way to include Google Fonts to the wp_head(). It isn’t fancy but it gets the job done.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

e.g.

  1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/very-basic-google-fonts directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Settings->Google Fonts screen to configure the plugin
  4. (Make your instructions match the desired user flow for activating and installing your plugin. Include any steps that might be needed for explanatory purposes)
sections.faq:
What’s the plugin like?

As simple as it can be. Just a sub-page of Settings with a textarea.

How do I choose which fonts I want?

Go to Settings/Google Fonts and enter the font names in the box, one per line.

E.g.
Open Sans
Vollkorn

short_description: The simple, bare-bones way to include Google Fonts to the wp_head(). It isn’t fancy but it gets the job done.
